This approach was mostly used in the older papers, when the accuracy of ab initio EXAFS simulations was limited. For example, this approach is applied in refs ( 157 and 158) to analyze EXAFS spectra of Pt catalysts for methanol oxidation and Ru-based catalysts for ORR. However, even nowadays it can provide better accuracy if very subtle effects need to be analyzed such as thermal expansion
159 or isotopic effects on EXAFS spectra.
